title: Missing 9 RP!!!!!! FOR VLAD
body: Hi rito . I have just recently bought RP . I bought some champions and stuff and had some left over i saved it for about a week so i can buy the new sale 4800 champ (in this case vlad) And im missing 9 RP!!!! Please is there any way you can buy me the champ in exchange for my 431 rp? Please i need help ,  This issue has come alot ! {{champion:8}}  My name is Subbwayz from OCE thank you

replies.body: Ultimately, you should calculate these things before you even get RP. Unfortunately, for something like 9 RP, you're not likely going to get it for free. Best solution is to just buy another RP card/however you get RP and save the leftover RP for something else.
